name: Airships: Conquer the Skies
description: Construct mighty steampunk airships and fly them into battle, waging war and conquering the skies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.8 Ghz+ Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM+ Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Not currently compatible with Intel HD graphics controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.2 Ghz+ Dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Not currently compatible with Intel HD graphics controllers
